original: yi ge de'i 'od kyis nam mkha'i dbyings khyab par bkang nas zhing gi dkyil 'khor yongs su sbyor ba'i don gnyis byas te /

analyzed: tshur 'dus pa las rje btsun rmugs 'dzin nag po sras dang bcas pa rdul phra rab kyi grangs dang mnyam pa spyan drangs la /

analyzed: khrus gsol ba sngon du 'gro bas mchod pa'i yan lag bcu gsum yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //

translated: the syllables o·πÉ, ja·πÉ, va·πÉ, la·πÉ, ja·∏•, va·πÉ, dra·πÉ, ya·πÉ, sva, and hƒÅ are imagined to be on moon seats, abiding in half-vajras, blazing in the center of the sun, or like a pure golden pillar.

analyzed: thugs dkyil mi phyed yi ge las 'phros phyogs bcu'i 'dren pa kun mchod cing //

analyzed: go cha bcur bcas skyob dbang nyid 'phros ma lus 'gro rnams rang 'dra byas //

analyzed: ne'u le klu dbang nor bdag 'od ldan lha klu mi yi nor rnams bsdus //

analyzed: zos shing zos te 'grangs gyur btsir bas de skyugs dngos grub yang yang blang //

original: de nas chu sbyin par bya ste /
analyzed: de nas chu sbyin par bya ste /

analyzed: lag pa'i mthil du bam ser po las gser gyi bum pa bzang po rin po che sna tshogs skyugs pa kha phyir bskyil ba'i yi ge bam de nyid kyis @81a * // mtshan par blta'o //
translated: In the palm of the hand, from a yellow va·πÉ, is an excellent golden vase, vomiting various jewels, marked by that very syllable va·πÉ.

original: bam gyi nang du dzam yig go //üîΩmkhrig ma la ni aom mo //
analyzed: bam gyi nang du dzam yig go // mkhrig ma la ni aom mo //
translated: In the center of the va·πÉ is a ja·πÉ syllable.üîΩOn the wrist is an o·πÉ.

original: mdzub mo la ni bha'o //üîΩgung mo la ni la'o //
analyzed: mdzub mo la ni bha'o // gung mo la ni la'o //

original: srin lag la dza'o //üîΩmthe'u chung la len no //
analyzed: srin lag la dza'o // mthe'u chung la len no //
translated: On the ring finger is a ja.üîΩOn the little finger is a le.

original: mthe bong la dra'o //
analyzed: mthe bong la dra'o //
translated: On the thumb is a dra.

original: nor bu mching ba'i gnas su ye'o //
analyzed: nor bu mching ba'i gnas su ye'o //

original: lag mthil gyi lto g-yon du sv'a'o //
analyzed: lag mthil gyi lto g-yon du sv'a'o //
translated: In the left palm is a sva.

original: de'i g-yas su h'a'o //
analyzed: de'i g-yas su h'a'o //
translated: To its right is a ha.

original: thams cad kyang zla ba la gnas shing /
analyzed: thams cad kyang zla ba la gnas shing /
translated: All of them are on moons.

original: gser 'od dri ma dang bral ba lhag par 'tsher bltar bsam mo //
analyzed: gser 'od dri ma dang bral ba lhag par 'tsher bltar bsam mo //
translated: Imagine that they are as radiant as pure, golden light.

original: de nas yang chu khyor ba gang kha la nye bar gtugs te /
analyzed: de nas yang chu khyor ba gang kha la nye bar gtugs te /
translated: Then, having brought a handful of water to one‚Äôs mouth,

original: aom aindra ni mu kham bhra ma ri sv'a h'a zhes bya bas sor mo lnga la lan re re dang / kha dang lag pa byin gyis brlab pa la gnyis te bdun gyis byin gyis brlab bo //
analyzed: aom aindra ni mu kham bhra ma ri sv'a h'a zhes bya bas sor mo lnga la lan re re dang / kha dang lag pa byin gyis brlab pa la gnyis te bdun gyis byin gyis brlab bo //

original: de'i 'og tu nag po chen po mdzes pa'i sku yongs su rdzogs pa zhig mdun gyi padma'i rin po che'i snod du zhugs te /
analyzed: de'i 'og tu nag po chen po mdzes pa'i sku yongs su rdzogs pa zhig mdun gyi padma'i rin po che'i snod du zhugs te /

original: rang gi thugs ka nas ci 'dra ba'i sku gzugs phyung ste bstims la /
analyzed: rang gi thugs ka nas ci 'dra ba'i sku gzugs phyung ste bstims la /
translated: Then, imagine that the form of the deity emerges from your heart and dissolves into the jeweled vessel.

original: rin po che'i bum pa rgyan thams cad kyis sbras pa yongs su gang bas rgyun mi 'chad pas chu spyin par bya'o //
analyzed: rin po che'i bum pa rgyan thams cad kyis sbras pa yongs su gang bas rgyun mi 'chad pas chu spyin par bya'o //

original: 'di ltar bya ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar bya ste /

analyzed: aom dzlum sv'a h'a zhes bya bas rin po ches brgyan pa'i lag pa nas zhal du'o //

analyzed: zhal nas rdo rje nor bu'i rtse mo ru'o //
translated: Then, imagine that it emerges from the mouth and enters the tip of the vajra gem.

analyzed: de nas slar lag mthil du 'bab ba'i rim pas mthar chu'i bdag po'i zhal du 'jug par bsams te /

original: cho ga de nyid kyis khyor ba brgya rtsa brgyad 'khrul pa med par sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: cho ga de nyid kyis khyor ba brgya rtsa brgyad 'khrul pa med par sbyin par bya'o //
translated: With that very rite, one should give one hundred and eight handfuls without error.

original: de'i tshe phyag gi mthil gyi bum pa dang / ne'u le dang ltos 'gro rnams kyi kha dang sna'i sgo la sogs pa bu ga'i rnam pa thams cad las rin po che'i rigs mi 'dra ba sdug cing yid du 'ong ba rnam pa du ma'i char chen po phab pas gnas khang la sogs pa mtha' dag yog
analyzed: de'i tshe phyag gi mthil gyi bum pa dang / ne'u le dang ltos 'gro rnams kyi kha dang sna'i sgo la sogs pa bu ga'i rnam pa thams cad las rin po che'i rigs mi 'dra ba sdug cing yid du 'ong ba rnam pa du ma'i char chen po phab pas gnas khang la sogs pa mtha' dag yog
translated: At that time, from all the openings of the mouths and noses of the pot in the palm of the hand, the mongoose, and the mouse, a great rain of many different kinds of beautiful and pleasing precious substances falls, filling the entire dwelling place and so forth.

original: cing nor gyis gang bar gyur par bsam mo //
analyzed: cing nor gyis gang bar gyur par bsam mo //
translated: One should imagine that it is filled with wealth.

original: de'i rjes la yi ge bcu pa la mchod pa rnam pa lnga'i sngags sbyar bas mchod cing /
analyzed: de'i rjes la yi ge bcu pa la mchod pa rnam pa lnga'i sngags sbyar bas mchod cing /
translated: After that, one should make offerings with the mantra of the five types of offerings applied to the ten-syllable [mantra].

original: thun mong dang khyad par gyi sgo nas bstod do //
analyzed: thun mong dang khyad par gyi sgo nas bstod do //
translated: One should praise [the deities] in general and in particular.

original: sngags de dag nyid kyis gtor ma byin gyis brlabs te dbul bar bya'o //
analyzed: sngags de dag nyid kyis gtor ma byin gyis brlabs te dbul bar bya'o //
translated: One should consecrate the bali with those very mantras and offer it.

original: na mo ra tna tra y'a ya /

original: aom ma ni bha dr'a ya /

original: ma h'a yaksha se n'a pa ta ye /
analyzed: ma h'a yaksha se n'a pa ta ye /

original: aom dzam mbha la dza lendra ye sv'a h'a /

original: zhes lan bdun nam brgya rtsa brgyad kyi bar du bzlas te ji ltar 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab po //
analyzed: zhes lan bdun nam brgya rtsa brgyad kyi bar du bzlas te ji ltar 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab po //
translated: Recite this mantra seven or one hundred and eight times and make requests for whatever you desire.

original: de nas yang mchod pas gtang rag phul te me tog @81b dbul bzhag nas yi ge brgya pas lhag chad kha bskang la rten spyi bo dang chu'i phud srin lag gis reg ste lce la bzhag cing /
analyzed: de nas yang mchod pas gtang rag phul te me tog @81b dbul bzhag nas yi ge brgya pas lhag chad kha bskang la rten spyi bo dang chu'i phud srin lag gis reg ste lce la bzhag cing /
translated: Then, make offerings of gratitude and place the flowers. With the one hundred syllable mantra, make up for any excesses and omissions. Touch the crown of the deity's head and the first portion of the water with your ring finger and place it on your tongue.

original: chu'i tshogs rgya mtshor 'jug ba'i dogs su dor bar bya'o //
analyzed: chu'i tshogs rgya mtshor 'jug ba'i dogs su dor bar bya'o //

original: de ltar zla ba drug la sogs par nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du bar ma chad bar chu spyin pa la brtson par byed na /
